block.p: Queen Elizabeth II has never abandoned the structured handheld 1950's pocketbook. Today a new generation has rediscovered the style, trading backpacks, a staple of the 80's, for the refinements of the frame bag (sometimes carried by one's side or jauntily suspended on either arm). Many are from secondhand shops. Designers have jumped on the trend: Hermes and Gucci have revived their classic bags from the 50's.

Queen Elizabeth II has never abandoned the structured handheld 1950's pocketbook. Many are from secondhand shops. Designers have jumped on the trend: Hermes and Gucci have revived their classic bags from the 50's. ON THE STREET
